summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 between FBI personnel and Assistant U.S. Attorneys regarding the shipment of approximately 23 boxes of case records from two FBI case files (72-MM-113327 and 31E-MM-108062) related to an investigation. The emails coordinate logistics via FedEx and confirm the prosecutors' contact information.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: Appears as the sender/recipient in the email chain, coordinating the shipment of case record boxes.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Identified as a prosecutor working on the investigation, provides contact information and confirms the contents of the boxes being shipped.

connections.person2: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: Coordinating the shipment of investigative case records from the FBI to the U.S. Attorney's office.

events.title: Prosecutor Contact Info Provided
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails FBI contacts to provide full contact information for the prosecution team working on the investigation.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Scheduled Shipment of Case Records
events.description: FBI personnel confirm that approximately 23 boxes of case records will be shipped via FedEx.

events.title: Coordination of Record Shipment
events.description: Email chain confirms the boxes were supposed to ship and were on a pallet ready to go, following up on previous coordination.

keyFacts: The document references the shipment of approximately 23 boxes of papers from two specific FBI case files: 72-MM-113327 (approx. 2 boxes) and 31E-MM-108062 (the remainder).
The correspondence is between FBI personnel and Assistant U.S. Attorneys from the Southern District of New York, indicating an active federal investigation.
The emails are dated June-July 2019, showing post-arvest logistical coordination regarding evidence transfer.
The tone is professional and cooperative, emphasizing the priority of the shipment for the investigation.
